talk.author: did:plc:32nqa4ogjnh55z62w5q4ancx
talk.utter: It is not the entire population, true, but it isn't one person either. It is a project of a group of people and the majority of the population supports it through brainwashing. However, the majority of the population are responsible as well, why do you think their leader can still keep going?

talk.author: did:plc:vhndxju2lu4wo54fq3a7j2rt
talk.utter:
I know it is easier to think it is a group think situation, but it is not. There is one person fanning these flames. And it is someone who knows the buttons of both sides. 

.

talk.author: did:plc:32nqa4ogjnh55z62w5q4ancx
talk.utter: It's not easier. It's a fact. If you want to only blame one person, how about Herzl who implemented the idea of Zionism...how about that Christian guy in the late 19th century who thought about the project Zionism? They're all already dead. It may start with one person's idea, but it isn't now.
